'''Amber''' is a playable [[Pyro]] [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

As the only remaining Outrider of the [[Knights of Favonius]], she is always ready to help the citizens of [[Mondstadt]] &mdash; whether it be something simple or perhaps a more challenging task.

She can be obtained for free in the Prologue [[The Outlander Who Caught the Wind|Act I: The Outlander Who Caught the Wind]] during the quest [[Winds of the Past]].
